Sentencas: Fuel cells are efficient and popular technologies, and have recently shown remarkable performance and expansion.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: Their use in coupled energy systems can result in significant performance of the energy system.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: In addition, the problem of fuel cell reliability (due to changes in load demand due to reduced fuel supply) can be solved by using it in integrated systems.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The energy system proposed in this research comprised of power generation system and energy storage system.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The power generation system includes a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), and thermoelectric and thermionic generators.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The energy in hydrogen fuel is converted to power and heat by the fuel cell.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The thermionic generator utilizes the waste heat of the fuel cell and generates power.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The thermoelectric generator is then coupled to the thermionic and generates more power using its dissipated heat.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: This leads to increased power generation and energy system performance.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The electrical energy obtained from the power generation system is stored by the energy storage system (via pumped hydro-compressed air system) for peak hours.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: In a scenario based on the benefit of clean energy, the performance of an electrolyzer coupled with a wind turbine to supply the fuel required by the SOFC is presented.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The results showed that the power generation system is capable of generating 533.4 W of electricity (with an output efficiency of 76.6%).
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: The contribution of fuel cell and thermoelectric and thermionic generators in power generation is 81.5, 5, and 13.5%, respectively.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: Furthermore, the storage efficiency and capacity of the system are 60% and 477.85 liters, respectively.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: It was also found that on annual average about 26.5 g/h of hydrogen fuel can be obtained from a wind-based hydrogen production system.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine

Sentencas: This amount is about 11% more than the SOFC needs.
Titulo: Determining the appropriate size of the electrical energy storage system of an energy process based on a solid oxide fuel cell and wind turbine
